: nat) => var n) (fun (m0 : nat) (Hrecm : fol.Terms L m0 -> fol.Terms L m0 -> nat -> fol.Term L) (ts0 ss0 : fol.Terms L (S m0)) => let s := consTerms L m0 ts0 in sig_rec (fun _ : {t : fol.Term L * fol.Terms L m0 | Tcons L m0 (fst t) (snd t) = ts0} => nat -> fol.Term L) (fun (x : fol.Term L * fol.Terms L m0) (p : Tcons L m0 (fst x) (snd x) = ts0) => prod_rec (fun x0 : fol.Term L * fol.Terms L m0 => Tcons L m0 (fst x0) (snd x0) = ts0 -> nat -> fol.Term L) (fun (a : fol.Term L) (b : fol.Terms L m0) (_ : Tcons L m0 (fst (a, b)) (snd (a, b)) = ts0) => let s0 := consTerms L m0 ss0 in sig_rec (fun _ : {t : fol.Term L * fol.Terms L m0 | Tcons L m0 (fst t) (snd t) = ss0} => nat -> fol.Term L) (fun (x0 : fol.Term L * fol.Terms L m0) (p1 : Tcons L m0 (fst x0) (snd x0) = ss0) => prod_rec (fun x1 : fol.Term L * fol.Terms L m0 => Tcons L m0 (fst x1) (snd x1) = ss0 -> nat -> fol.Term L) (fun (a0 : fol.Term L) (b0 : fol.Terms L m0) (_ : Tcons L m0 (fst (a0, b0)) (snd (a0, b0)) = ss0) (n : nat) => if Nat.eq_dec n (m0 + m0) then a else if Nat.eq_dec n (S (m0 + m0)) then a0 else Hrecm b b0 n) x0 p1) s0) x p) s) m ts ss : forall m : nat, fol.Terms L m -> fol.Terms L m -> nat -> fol.Term L a, b : fol.Term L n : nat ts : fol.Terms L n v : nat T : fol.System L H : SysPrf T (equal a b) Unable to unify "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (_ : folProof.Prf L Axm (subAllFormula L ?M1427 ?M1425)), forall g : fol.Formula L, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula L) ?M1420 g" with "(fix PairwiseEqual (T : fol.System L) (n : nat) {struct n} : fol.Terms L n -> fol.Terms L n -> Prop := match n as n0 return (fol.Terms L n0 -> fol.Terms L n0 -> Prop) with | 0 => fun _ _ : fol.Terms L 0 => True | S x => fun ts ss : fol.Terms L (S x) => let (a, b) := proj1_sig (consTerms L x ts) in let (c, d) := proj1_sig (consTerms L x ss) in SysPrf T (equal a c) /\\ PairwiseEqual T x b d end) T n ((fix substituteTerm (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct s} : fol.Term L := match s with | @fol.var _ v => if Nat.eq_dec x v then t else fol.var L v | @fol.apply _ f ts => fol.apply L f (substituteTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts x t) end with substituteTerms (n : nat) (ss : fol.Terms L n) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct ss} : fol.Terms L n := match ss in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (fol.Terms L n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil L | @Tcons _ m s ts => Tcons L m (substituteTerm s x t) (substituteTerms m ts x t) end for substituteTerms) n ts v a) ((fix substituteTerm (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct s} : fol.Term L := match s with | @fol.var _ v => if Nat.eq_dec x v then t else fol.var L v | @fol.apply _ f ts => fol.apply L f (substituteTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts x t) end with substituteTerms (n : nat) (ss : fol.Terms L n) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct ss} : fol.Terms L n := match ss in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (fol.Terms L n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil L | @Tcons _ m s ts => Tcons L m (substituteTerm s x t) (substituteTerms m ts x t) end for substituteTerms) n ts v b)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
var: nat -> fol.Term L
apply: forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L
equal: fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
atomic: forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L
impH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
notH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
forallH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
orH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
andH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
existH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
iffH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
ifThenElseH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
Prf: fol.Formulas L -> fol.Formula L -> Set
SysPrf: fol.System L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop
termsMap: forall m : nat, fol.Terms L m -> fol.Terms L m -> nat -> fol.Term L

Goal:
forall (a b : fol.Term L) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> PairwiseEqual T n (substituteTerms L n ts v a) (substituteTerms L n ts v b)

Premises:
PairwiseEqual : fol.System L -> forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> fol.Terms L n -> Prop
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L orH := fol.orH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Form
Trying to mask the absolute name "apply"! [masking-absolute-name,deprecated]
Notation Formula := (fol.Formula L)

Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation Terms := (fol.Terms L)
Notation System := (fol.System L)
Functions = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Functions : Language -> Set

cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [L : Language var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L orH := fol.orH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L andH := fol.andH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L ->...-> fol.Term L |- Type]

Formula_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Type), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4

Formula_depth_rec2_imp : forall (L : Language) (Q P : fol.Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : fol.Term L, Q (fol.equal L t t0) -> P (fol.equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (fol.atomic L r t) -> P (fol.atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : fol.Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (fol.impH L f f0) -> P (fol.impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4...

Formula_depth_rec2rec_nice : forall (L : Language) (Q P : fol.Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : fol.Term L, Q (fol.equal L t t0) -> P (fol.equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (fol.atomic L r t) -> P (fol.atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : fol.Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (fol.impH L f f0) -> P (fol.impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q =...
substituteFormulaForall : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (f : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b (fol.forallH L n f) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L b}) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L (fol.forallH L n f)}
subTermsExch : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v2 s2) v1 s1
equalFunction : forall (T : fol.System L) (f : Functions L) (ts ss : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f))), PairwiseEqual T (arity L (inr f)) ts ss -> SysPrf T (equal (apply f ts) (apply f ss))
subSubTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v2 s2) v1 (substituteTerm L s1 v2 s2)
subAllCloseFrom : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L), folProof.SysPrf L T (closeFrom L 0 n f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (subAllFormula L f (fun x : nat => if le_lt_dec n x then fol.var L x else m x))
equalRelation : forall (T : fol.System L) (r : Relations L) (ts ss : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), PairwiseEqual T (arity L (inl r)) ts ss -> SysPrf T (iffH (atomic r ts) (atomic r ss))
subSubAllTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteTerms L n (subAllTerms L n ts m) v s = subAllTerms L n ts (fun n0 : nat => substituteTerm L (m n0) v s)
Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> SProp), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
substituteFormulaImp : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L), (nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}) -> forall g : fol.Formula L, (nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L g}) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L (fol.impH L f g)}

```coq
intros a b n ts v T H.
unfold PairwiseEqual in H. unfold subAllFormula. unfold substituteTerms.
unfold subAllTerms. unfold PairwiseEqual. intros.
rewrite H0. rewrite H0 in H. apply addPairwiseEquals with (n:=n); auto.
Qed.```
